ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of SHEILA WEATHERILL of Edmonton, Alberta, to the position of special adviser to the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food as Independent Investigator to conduct an investigation into the listeriosis outbreak, to hold office during pleasure, for a term ending July 31, 2009.
